actions.name: DeleteScalingPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a scaling policy

actions.name: DeleteScheduledAction
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a scheduled action

actions.name: DeregisterScalableTarget
actions.description: Grants permission to deregister a scalable target

actions.name: DescribeScalableTargets
actions.description: Grants permission to describe one or more scalable targets in the specified namespace

actions.name: DescribeScalingActivities
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a set of scaling activities or all scaling activities in the specified namespace

actions.name: DescribeScalingPolicies
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a set of scaling policies or all scaling policies in the specified namespace

actions.name: DescribeScheduledActions
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a set of scheduled actions or all scheduled actions in the specified namespace

actions.name: PutScalingPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to create and update a scaling policy for a scalable target

actions.name: PutScheduledAction
actions.description: Grants permission to create and update a scheduled action for a scalable target

actions.name: RegisterScalableTarget
actions.description: Grants permission to register AWS or custom resources as scalable targets with Application Auto Scaling and to update configuration parameters used to manage a scalable target
